description: This file defines the interface for the CCSP Message Bus Service, including function declarations for engagement, initialization, finalization, resource management, signal sending, and message handling related to the message bus.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages with the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a health check or verification of the message bus connection using user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with specified priority associated with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating a parameter value change, including old and new values, and access list.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_SendTransferCompleteSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating completion of a transfer.

methods.name: CcspPandM_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles incoming DBus messages for a given connection and user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_RegisterToCR
methods.description: Registers the component with the Configuration Repository, using an object handle and parameter array.
